name: Womens Summer Wedge Flip Flops Platform Shoes
description: Women's wedge Flip Flops with soft, comfortable and breathable synthetic upper. Non-slip wear-resistant rubber sole, offers the balance and stability to work all day. Women's summer flipFlops with velcro design, easy to put on and take off. The hollow design makes the summer flipFlops more stylish and fashionable. Occasions: Outdoor platform shoes can be worn in any casual occasions, shopping, work, beach, vacation, party, walking, etc. These flipFlops are the best choice for summer casual or dressy.

name: Flip Flops Waterproof Various Colors For Men Sv-054-g
description: This sandal model is made of EVA, an ultra-light material, very resistant, 100% waterproof, very soft and flexible that will give you an ergonomic footprint and maximum comfort when walking. It has a small arch support and raised toes to be comfortable all the time. In addition, its buckles and straps are adjustable, to improve the perfect fit and more security. Ideal for the beach, pool, gym, spa, swimming, home, bathroom or any casual occasion. Vivid and incredible colors.
